SBHS Final Yearbook Sales!
We only have 13 extra yearbooks left and then we are completely sold out forever! Sales online end Friday, May 15th or until we are sold out!
Place your order at the link...

Exciting graduation update!
These are the current plans which can always change due to the ongoing situation. We want to have a special way to celebrate the Class of 2020 and have something for the...

Sixth grader June made masks for the Kind Clippers Club! They look great! Way to help out our community, June!
